imdb.plot outline: Acclaimed for his profound sense of poetry and distinctive style, Steinway's artist pianist Sandro Russo has been in demand as a soloist in many venues around the world. His performance at the Berlin Konzerthaus is the last one of his 2015 European Tour. Supporting Non-Profit Organizations in Germany: LUBA Dresden e.V., Dresdner Kinder Herzenswünschen, Berlin Non-Profit Organization for Musicians, Klinikum St. Georg in Leipzig. Program: Chopin's 4 Ballades , Lowell Liebermann Nocturne Nr. 10 and Rachmaninoff's Sonate Nr. 1.
imdb.title: Unspoken Words
plot: Acclaimed for his profound sense of poetry and distinctive style, Steinway's artist pianist Sandro Russo has been in demand as a soloist in many venues around the world. His performance at the Berlin Konzerthaus is the last one of his 2015 European Tour. Supporting Non-Profit Organizations in Germany: LUBA Dresden e.V., Dresdner Kinder Herzenswünschen, Berlin Non-Profit Organization for Musicians, Klinikum St. Georg in Leipzig. Program: Chopin's 4 Ballades , Lowell Liebermann Nocturne Nr. 10 and Rachmaninoff's Sonate Nr. 1.::Andreas Smith
